# cli
## change directories easily
```bash
alias ..='cd ..'
```
```bash
alias ...='cd ../..'
```
```bash
alias ....='cd ../../..'
```
```bash
alias .....='cd ../../../..'
```

## cli
#### change directories easily
```bash
```bash
alias ..='cd ..'
```
```
```bash
```bash
alias ...='cd ../..'
```
```
```bash
```bash
alias ....='cd ../../..'
```
```
```bash
```bash
alias .....='cd ../../../..'
```
```



## ls
```bash
alias l='ls -lah'
```
